meanings.definition: A device used to measure the flow rate of a gas or liquid in a closed system.
meanings.sent1: The rotameters in the lab help us track how much liquid is flowing.
meanings.sent2: The technician checked the rotameters to ensure the gas flow was steady.
meanings.sent3: During the experiment, the rotameters decided to have a race to see who could measure faster.
meanings.sent4: The rotameters hummed softly as they diligently monitored the liquid flow.
meanings.sent5: The shiny rotameters gleamed under the fluorescent lights, making the measurements easy to read.
